tosdr.case: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
quoteText: You shall indemnify and hold Turnitin and its licensors, vendors, and service providers harmless from any and all claims arising out of Your use of the Service or use of the information to determine placement of, or grades for students, or for any other purpose.
